00014 #include "fft.h"

00016 #include <gsl/gsl_sf.h>
00017 #define bessel_i0 gsl_sf_bessel_I0
00018 
00019 int
00020 FFTBase::fitLength(int length0) {
00021     int length = lrint(pow(2.0, (ceil(log(length0) / log(2.0)))));      
00022     length = std::min(length, (int)lrint(pow(2.0, (ceil(log(length0 / 3.0) / log(2.0))))) * 3);     
00023     length = std::min(length, (int)lrint(pow(2.0, (ceil(log(length0 / 5.0) / log(2.0))))) * 5);     
00024     length = std::min(length, (int)lrint(pow(2.0, (ceil(log(length0 / 7.0) / log(2.0))))) * 7);     
00025     length = std::min(length, (int)lrint(pow(2.0, (ceil(log(length0 / 9.0) / log(2.0))))) * 9);     
00026     ASSERT(length0 <= length);
00027 //  dbgPrint(formatString("FFT using L=%d\n", length));
00028     return length;
00029 }
00030 
00031 double FFTBase::windowFuncRect(double x) {
00032     return (fabs(x) <= 0.5) ? 1 : 0;
00033 //  return 1.0;
00034 }
00035 double FFTBase::windowFuncTri(double x) {
00036     return std::max(0.0, 1.0 - 2.0 * fabs(x));
00037 }
00038 double FFTBase::windowFuncHanning(double x) {
00039     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00040         return 0.0;
00041     return 0.5 + 0.5*cos(2*M_PI*x);
00042 }
00043 double FFTBase::windowFuncHamming(double x) {
00044     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00045         return 0.0;
00046     return 0.54 + 0.46*cos(2*M_PI*x);
00047 }
00048 double FFTBase::windowFuncBlackman(double x) {
00049     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00050         return 0.0;
00051     return 0.42323+0.49755*cos(2*M_PI*x)+0.07922*cos(4*M_PI*x);
00052 }
00053 double FFTBase::windowFuncBlackmanHarris(double x) {
00054     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00055         return 0.0;
00056     return 0.35875+0.48829*cos(2*M_PI*x)+0.14128*cos(4*M_PI*x)+0.01168*cos(6*M_PI*x);
00057 }
00058 double FFTBase::windowFuncFlatTop(double x) {
00059     return windowFuncHamming(x)*((fabs(x) < 1e-4) ? 1 : sin(4*M_PI*x)/(4*M_PI*x));
00060 }
00061 double FFTBase::windowFuncKaiser(double x, double alpha) {
00062     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00063         return 0.0;
00064     x *= 2;
00065     x = sqrt(std::max(1 - x*x, 0.0));
00066     return bessel_i0(M_PI*alpha*x) / bessel_i0(M_PI*alpha);
00067 }
00068 double FFTBase::windowFuncKaiser1(double x) {
00069     return windowFuncKaiser(x, 3.0);
00070 }
00071 double FFTBase::windowFuncKaiser2(double x) {
00072     return windowFuncKaiser(x, 7.2);
00073 }
00074 double FFTBase::windowFuncKaiser3(double x) {
00075     return windowFuncKaiser(x, 15.0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 double FFTBase::windowFuncFlatTopLong(double x) {
00079     return windowFuncHamming(x)*((fabs(x) < 1e-4) ? 1 : sin(6*M_PI*x)/(6*M_PI*x));
00080 }
00081 double FFTBase::windowFuncFlatTopLongLong(double x) {
00082     return windowFuncHamming(x)*((fabs(x) < 1e-4) ? 1 : sin(8*M_PI*x)/(8*M_PI*x));
00083 }
00084 double FFTBase::windowFuncHalfSin(double x) {
00085     if (fabs(x) >= 0.5)
00086         return 0.0;
00087     return cos(M_PI*x);
00088 }

00090 
00091 FFTBase::FFTBase(int length) {
00092     m_fftlen = length;
00093     m_fftplan.reset(new fftw_plan);
00094 }
00095 FFTBase::~FFTBase() {
00096     fftw_destroy_plan(*m_fftplan);
00097 }
00098 FFT::FFT(int sign, int length) : FFTBase(length) {
00099     m_pBufin = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * length);
00100     m_pBufout = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * length);
00101     *m_fftplan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(length, m_pBufin, m_pBufout,
00102         (sign > 0) ? FFTW_BACKWARD : FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00103 }
00104 FFT::~FFT() {
00105     fftw_free(m_pBufin);
00106     fftw_free(m_pBufout);
00107 }
00108 void
00109 FFT::exec(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein,
00110         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout) {
00111     int size = wavein.size();
00112     ASSERT(size == length());
00113     waveout.resize(size);
00114     const std::complex<double> *pin = &wavein[0];
00115     fftw_complex *pout = m_pBufin;
00116     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00117         (*pout)[0] = pin->real();
00118         (*pout)[1] = pin->imag();
00119         pout++;
00120         pin++;
00121     }
00122     fftw_execute(*m_fftplan);
00123     const fftw_complex *pin2 = m_pBufout;
00124     std::complex<double> *pout2 = &waveout[0];
00125     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00126         *pout2 = std::complex<double>((*pin2)[0], (*pin2)[1]);
00127         pout2++;
00128         pin2++;
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 RFFT::RFFT(int length) : FFTBase(length) {
00133     m_pBufin = (double*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(double) * length);
00134     m_pBufout = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (length / 2 + 1));
00135     *m_fftplan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(length, m_pBufin, m_pBufout, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00136 }
00137 RFFT::~RFFT() {
00138     fftw_free(m_pBufin);
00139     fftw_free(m_pBufout);
00140 }
00141 void
00142 RFFT::exec(const std::vector<double>& wavein,
00143         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout) {
00144     int size = wavein.size();
00145     ASSERT(size == length());
00146     waveout.resize(size / 2 + 1);
00147     const double *pin = &wavein[0];
00148     double *pout = m_pBufin;
00149     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00150         *pout++ = *pin++;
00151     }
00152     fftw_execute(*m_fftplan);
00153     const fftw_complex *pin2 = m_pBufout;
00154     std::complex<double> *pout2 = &waveout[0];
00155     for(int i = 0; i < size / 2 + 1; i++) {
00156         *pout2 = std::complex<double>((*pin2)[0], (*pin2)[1]);
00157         pout2++;
00158         pin2++;
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 RIFFT::RIFFT(int length) : FFTBase(length) {
00163     m_pBufin = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (length / 2 + 1));
00164     m_pBufout = (double*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(double) * length);
00165     *m_fftplan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(length, m_pBufin, m_pBufout, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00166 }
00167 RIFFT::~RIFFT() {
00168     fftw_free(m_pBufin);
00169     fftw_free(m_pBufout);
00170 }
00171 void
00172 RIFFT::exec(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein,
00173         std::vector<double>& waveout) {
00174     int size = length();
00175     ASSERT((int)wavein.size() == length() / 2 + 1);
00176     waveout.resize(size);
00177     const std::complex<double> *pin = &wavein[0];
00178     fftw_complex *pout = m_pBufin;
00179     for(int i = 0; i < size / 2 + 1; i++) {
00180         (*pout)[0] = pin->real();
00181         (*pout)[1] = pin->imag();
00182         pout++;
00183         pin++;
00184     }
00185     fftw_execute(*m_fftplan);
00186     const double *pin2 = m_pBufout;
00187     double *pout2 = &waveout[0];
00188     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00189         *pout2++ = *pin2++;
00190     }
00191 }
